title: Hehe xd can you guys not lock random threads pls ty
body: I was gonna post in that one thread where the guy was complaining about his ban. What is it? If ppl are complaining to much you have to shut it down. Hehe.

replies.body: I'm not the one that locked the thread but I understand why. Discussion was going nowhere, which completely defeats the point of the post, and it was just turning into a great big argument, which wasn't in any way constructive. Locking the thread forces people to take a step back and cool off.
